text_blocks.snippet: For most users, the Apple MacBook Air 13-Inch (M4, 2025) and the Dell Inspiron 14 Plus (2024) are popular choices. The MacBook Air is praised for its portability and performance, while the Dell Inspiron offers a good balance of features and price.
